extensionName.message: IGPlus - Hide Instagram Reels, Explore Page

extensionDescription.message: Disable Instagram Shorts, videos, comments, suggestions wall, vanity metrics, homepage recomendations, trending... and many more.

header_subtitle.message: Less distraction, more focus on what matters.

mi_2.message: Disable the Reels page & Reels videos

mi_11.message: Disable likes and follower counts (vanity metrics)

mi_14.message: Block all videos to reduce traffic usage

mi_15.message: Block all images to reduce traffic usage

d_title.message: Donations keep IGPlus up and running.

d_subtitle.message: I spend hours every week fixing bugs, adding and improving features, and addressing user feedback. Your support is crucial to continued maintenance.

d_cred__1.message: You can also share IGPlus with your friends or leave a

s_subtitle.message: Here are some troubleshooting steps you can try:

s_res__2.message: Disable and then enable again IGPlus.

s_emailme.message: If the problem still here, please email me at

s_effic.message: To help me assist you more efficiently, please include this information:

s_detail__1.message: The version of IGPlus you are using.

s_detail__2.message: A screenshot or video demonstrating the problem.

s_detail__3.message: A detailed description of the issue.

s_detail__4.message: Your browser and its version (e.g., Firefox 86.0).

mi_16.message: Navigate to Direct from the Main page
